com.okay.router.configs

类 RouterConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.okay.router.configs.RouterConfiguration

  • public final class RouterConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Entrance class to store router configurations.

        public RouterConfiguration setInterceptor(RouteInterceptor interceptor)

      • startHostService

        public void startHostService(java.lang.String hostPackage,
                             android.content.Context context)
        参数:
        hostPackage - The package name of host. it to launch a remote service of host.
        context - The valid context
        另请参阅:
        startHostService(String, Context, String)

      • startHostService

        public void startHostService(java.lang.String hostPackage,
                             android.content.Context context,
                             java.lang.String pluginName)
        start a remote host service
        参数:
        hostPackage - The package name of host. it to launch a remote service of host.
        context - The valid context
        pluginName - The unique identifier plugin name. or null to use the plugin-package name for it.

      • isRegister

        public boolean isRegister(java.lang.String pluginName)
        Check if the specified plug-in names have been registered to the remote service.
        参数:
        pluginName - The specified plug-in names
        返回:
        True if it has been registered.

      • restoreExtras

        public RouteBundleExtras restoreExtras(android.net.Uri uri)
        Restore a RouteBundleExtras by uri. this method should only be called in lifecycle of RouteCallback. otherwise it will be null cause it is cleaned.
        参数:
        uri - The uri that you open
        返回:
        The RouteBundleExtras instance that you may set before before you open the routing by uri.
